abstrac: Business Valuation | Financial Model | Pitch Deck | Business Plan | Financial Projection Convertible Valuation |409A Valuation | Intangible Valuation | The Accredited in Business Valuation
bio:
Mr. Gaurav Barick is a proud alumnus of Indian Institute of Foreign Trade, New Delhi (Top 25 B-Schools Asia) & Venture Capitalist specialized in Business Valuation, Business Plan, Pitch Deck, Financial Modelling, Private Equity, Equity Research, M&A & Start-up consulting. During the 11- year tenure as an Investment Banker, he has completed approx. 1200 Business Valuations & 30 Merger & Acquisitions across different Context & Industries.
Mr. Gaurav has access of various International software's/databases like EURO MONITOR, BLOOMBERG, STATISTA.COM, PROQUEST, WITS & Science Direct for Industry & Market Research.

Education
Mr. Gaurav is an MBA-Finance from Indian Institute of Foreign Trade & currently he is in final year of his Ph.D. -International Finance from the same Institute. He has earned “The Accredited in Business Valuation (ABV®)” credential from AICPA. Further, he has completed Advanced Responsible Investment Analysis- EGS Investing from PRI Academy, UK (UN-PRI), Qualified Registered Valuer & Research Analyst from Insolvency and Bankruptcy Board of India & from SEBI (Securities and Exchange Board of India) respectively.

My Skills are:
 Business Valuation
 Startup Valuation
 Pitch Deck
 Business Plan
 Brand Valuation/Intangible Valuation
 Financial Modelling/Financial Projection
 Equity Research/Investment Research
 Industry Research/Market Research
 Academic Research/Empirical Research
 Merger & Acquisitions
 Private Equity/Venture Capital
 DCF, Convertible Valuation, Option Valuation & Comparable Valuation
 Cap table Analysis
 Financial Analysis
 ESG Investing
 Impact Invesment
 Sustainable investing
 409A Valuation Report
 Purchase Price Allocation
 Litigation Valuation
 Economic damages Calculation

bio:
I am a web designer and developer with five years of experience in creating beautiful and functional websites for businesses and individuals. I am proficient in using various platforms including Wix, Webflow, Squarespace, Weebly, and Godaddy to create responsive and visually appealing websites.

My expertise in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript allows me to create custom designs and interactive elements that enhance the user experience. Additionally, I have experience in website optimization, including page speed optimization and search engine optimization, to ensure that websites are fast, secure, and easily discoverable by potential customers.

I am passionate about creating websites that not only look great but also deliver results. Whether it's increasing website traffic, generating leads, or increasing sales, I am committed to helping my clients achieve their business goals through effective website design and development.

If you are looking for a talented and reliable web designer and developer, I would be happy to discuss your project needs and see how I can help you achieve your goals.

abstrac: My goal is to overcome the client's expectations. My work desk produces every day: - Animation (3D mainly, but also 2D) - 3D design (printable models, for games,...) - 2D Illustrations
bio:
My school has been traditional art, including several exhibitions in Barcelona (1985-2000).
The years guided me to digital image and animation with Photoshop and Macromedia Flash (1998-2003).
From year 2005 I dived into the 3D world via Blender, Autodesk Inventor, freeCAD, etc.
  Nowadays I work usually with:
- Blender and several render engines (Cycles, Luxrender, Yafaray,..), 
- Krita, Gimp and Inkscape (2D)
- Synfig Studio and Pencil (2D animation).

  From 4 years ago I teach Blender in academies, and also online.

My work begin at 6 am till 12 am, and from 3pm to 6 pm (CET), 
from Monday to Friday.

abstrac: Here for you to offer custom hand-crafted logo design services, illustration, character creation, mascots, websites, SEO friendly writing.
bio:
MIKEADV is a full-service branding and design agency located in Revere, Boston. The company was founded by, a seasoned brand designer Adobe Certified Professional with over 20 years of experience in the field. Our mission is to help businesses of all sizes stand out in a crowded marketplace by creating unique and effective branding and design solutions.

The team at MIKEADV is composed of a diverse group of professionals with expertise in branding, graphic design, web design, illustration, and character creation. They work closely with clients to understand their business goals and objectives and then use their creativity and expertise to develop a branding strategy that will help them reach their target audience and achieve their business objectives.

One of the services that MIKEADV offers is the creation of a strong visual identity for a brand. This includes the development of a logo, color scheme, typography, and other visual elements that will be used across all of the brand's marketing materials. The team also creates marketing materials such as brochures, business cards, and websites that are consistent with the brand's visual identity.

In addition to branding and design, MIKEADV also offers web development services. The team can design and develop a website that not only looks great but also functions smoothly and effectively. They use the latest web technologies to ensure that the website is responsive, fast, and easy to navigate.

Another service that MIKEADV offers is marketing and advertising. The team can help businesses develop a marketing strategy that will reach their target audience and drive sales. They have experience creating and executing marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email marketing, and paid advertising.

MIKEADV also offers language services, they have a team of native speakers of Italian and English who can assist with translations, localization, and language-specific marketing campaigns.

bio:
I have 5 years experience developing Embedded applications using C++, C and assembly. I can program the following MCUs/MPUs:

1.  PIC Microcontrollers using MikroC and  MPLabX.
2.  AVR, ARM, SAM and STM32 using MikroC, Atmel studio with ASF, Atollic or Keil C
3. NRF and ESP microcontrollers on NRF SDK, ESP SDK or on the Arduino IDE.
4. All Arduino Boards and I have experience with the AVR, SAM boards, NodeMCU, ESP32, NRF52480, uC32, Wi-FIRE etc.

I can design both analog and digital Circuits and PCBs using the following software:
1. Altium Designer
2. Eagle Premium
3. Proteus
4. KiCAD

I'm also an instrumentation Engineer with these skills:
1. PLC programming of ABB, Siemens, Omron or Direct Logic PLCs
2. SCADA development on Indusoft Web studio, Pulse or RS View 32 Works. 
3. Electrical wiring diagrams on Autocad Electrical. 
4. 2D and 3D CAD drawings on Autocad or Solid works. 

I'm also a Software developer for PC and Web

My name is Imdad, an India-based freelancer with an easy-going personality and a talent for building long-term relationships. I provide multiple services to my clients as a Virtual Assistant. 
 
I started this journey in 2016, remotely taking care of my clients with little or no supervision. I solve my client's problems by crafting solutions and making processes more efficient. I am an expert with office software tools and quickly learn new platforms to help my clients achieve their objectives. I am motivated to deliver my promises, detail-oriented, and provide quality services. 
 
I work with small and medium-sized businesses to provide backend administrative support, customer support and outreach, lead generation, and market analysis.
